config.title: Header Style 52

variables.menu_drop_font: 500 13px/1.35 Poppins, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 600 14px/1.35 Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 14px/1.35 Poppins, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-52" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-top" > <container name="header-top-inner" htmlId="header-top-inner" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="row container" > <container name="header-top-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-13 header-top-left" /> <container name="header-top-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-11 header-top-right" /> </container> </container> <container name="header-middle" htmlId="header-middle" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-middle container" /> <container name="header-bottom" htmlId="header-bottom" after="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-bottom" > <container name="header-bottom-container" htmlClass="container" htmlTag="div"> <container name="header-bottom-row" htmlClass="row cdz-fix-left menu-area" htmlTag="div"> <container name="header-vertical-menu-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 col-md-4 header-vertical-menu-wrap no-pad-right" label="Header Vertical Menu" /> <container name="header-bottom-center" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-18 col-md-14 header-menu-wrap" /> <container name="header-bottom-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 header-bottom-right no-pad-left" /> </container> </container> </container> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row row" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-9 col-md-6 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-middle" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-15 col-md-11 header-panel-middle header-search-wrap" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 col-md-7 header-panel-right"> </container> </container> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-middle" />
<move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-panel-middle" after="-"/> <move element="minicart" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-left" />
<!-- Top Right --> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-top-right" before="-" /> <referenceContainer name="header-top-left"> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="header-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Directory\Block\Currency" name="header-switch-currency" template="Magento_Directory::currency-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="header-switch-store" template="switch/stores.phtml"> <arguments> <argument name="id_modifier" xsi:type="string">header-nav</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header-panel-right"> <block name="header-extra-text-2" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_2</argument> </action> </block> </referenceContainer> <!-- End Top Right -->
<referenceContainer name="header-bottom-right"> <block name="header-extra-text-1" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_1</argument> </action> </block> </referenceContainer>
<referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-bottom-center" before="-" /> <move element="store-vertical-menu" destination="header-vertical-menu-wrap" />
<move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> <referenceBlock name="store-vertical-menu"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">menu_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">3</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> </body>
config.content: {"content_1":"<div class=\"wrapper-ads hidden-xs\"><a href=\"#\"><em class=\"fa fa-flash\" aria-hidden=\"true\"> <\/em>Daily Deal<\/a> <a href=\"#\"><em class=\"fa fa-tag\" aria-hidden=\"true\"> <\/em>Track Orders<\/a><\/div>","content_2":"<div class=\"hot-line-wrapper\"><span class=\"msg-text\">Call us now: <\/span><a class=\"telephone\" href=\"tel:123455688xxx\">(123) 455688021<\/a><\/div>"}
